content.raw:
When I’ve run longer simulations, this node will die multiple times.

This is the relevant error:

```
[X4/roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2] process has died [pid 19704, exit code -11, cmd /home/subt-derek/subt_ws/install/lib/rotors_control/roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node odometry:=odometry/filtered __name:=roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node __log:=/home/subt-derek/.ros/log/887fc8b8-ad92-11e9-a141-7085c2526b2b/X4-roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2.log].
log file: /home/subt-derek/.ros/log/887fc8b8-ad92-11e9-a141-7085c2526b2b/X4-roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2*.log
[X4/roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2] restarting process
process[X4/roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2]: started with pid [10937]
```

in the terminal where I ran:

```
source /opt/ros/melodic/setup.bash
source ~/subt_ws/install/setup.bash
ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_01 robotName1:=X4 robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_2
```

The process does restart, but the restart causes a discontinuity in our controller.

And there’s no log file named `X4-roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2.log` inside of `~/.ros/log/887fc887fc8b8-ad92-11e9-a141-7085c2526b2b8b/`
content.html:
When I’ve run longer simulations, this node will die multiple times.

This is the relevant error:

[X4/roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2] process has died [pid 19704, exit code -11, cmd /home/subt-derek/subt_ws/install/lib/rotors_control/roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node odometry:=odometry/filtered __name:=roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node __log:=/home/subt-derek/.ros/log/887fc8b8-ad92-11e9-a141-7085c2526b2b/X4-roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2.log].
log file: /home/subt-derek/.ros/log/887fc8b8-ad92-11e9-a141-7085c2526b2b/X4-roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2*.log
[X4/roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2] restarting process
process[X4/roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2]: started with pid [10937]

in the terminal where I ran:

source /opt/ros/melodic/setup.bash
source ~/subt_ws/install/setup.bash
ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_01 robotName1:=X4 robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_2

The process does restart, but the restart causes a discontinuity in our controller.

And there’s no log file named X4-roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node-2.log inside of ~/.ros/log/887fc887fc8b8-ad92-11e9-a141-7085c2526b2b8b/
